definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He decided to go into politics despite his lineage as much as because of it, family members said.
sentences.chinese: 家人說，家世對於他從政的決定是雙面刃。

sentences.english: If anybody sees these two oil paintings. Can awe them the family background.
sentences.chinese: 任何人若看到這兩幅油畫，都會敬畏他們的家世。

sentences.english: This paper conducted a research in his family and career.
sentences.chinese: 文章就魯明善的家世及其生平仕履進行了研究。

sentences.english: This new novel is an absorbing saga.
sentences.chinese: 這部新小說是一怖引人入勝賭家世孝說。

sentences.english: This new novel is an absorbing family saga.
sentences.chinese: 這部新小說是一部引人入勝的家世小說。

sentences.english: Given an audience with President Lincoln, he discoursed at length on the high and ancient nobility of his distinguished family.
sentences.chinese: 他不厭其煩細說自己家世顯赫，自古就是高門貴族。

sentences.english: Names reveal who your family is.
sentences.chinese: 名字顯示你的家世背景。

sentences.english: The first part mainly researches the family background of Zhang Zhan and his biography.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分主要考證張湛的家世及其生平。

sentences.english: The first chapter introduces Yang Sichang's life and his family;
sentences.chinese: 第一章，介紹楊嗣昌的生平及其家世。

sentences.english: Lacking data makes Bukui and his family less known.
sentences.chinese: 由於資料的匾乏，人們對卜魁的生平和家世瞭解不多。

sentences.english: This new novel is an absorbing family saga. //Here 'this' can be used before it too.
sentences.chinese: 這部新小說是一部引人入勝的家世小說。

sentences.english: I don't fit the typical pedigree, and I haven't spent my career in the halls of Washington.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有顯赫的家世，也沒有在華盛頓工作的經歷。

sentences.english: Merit, as well as birth, now counts for something.
sentences.chinese: 功勳，如今和家世一樣，物有所值。

sentences.english: There exits some points unclear about Chen Cheng's life and his family.
sentences.chinese: 陳誠的家世生平，一直存在一些隱匿不清之處。

definition: offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
one's life experience/one's lot/one's past history
to be born of/to come from/family background/class origin
